title: Shower Caddy Drip Guard
summary: Keep shower bottles from dripping on the floor with a simple guard and absorbent mat.

fitCheck.question: Do you have a hanging shower caddy?
Is water dripping onto the floor after showers?
Can you wipe down the wall weekly?

kit.name: Rust-resistant hooks
kit.why: Keeps the caddy stable and level.

steps: Hang the caddy at shoulder height so bottles sit level.
Place the drip tray under the lowest shelf.
Lay the microfiber mat on the tub edge or floor.
Wipe the tray weekly to avoid soap buildup.
mistakes: Letting water pool without a mat can cause slip hazards.
Overloading the caddy makes it tilt and drip more.
